title: Actor
content:
Ability Score Improvement Feature or a Feat.

Actor Information

Your Charisma increases by 1, to a maximum of 20. Your Proficiency Bonus is also doubled for Deception and Performance Checks.

How to unlock Actor

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Actor

All Classes at Level 4

Actor Tips & Notes
